summary: Request for improved IDE support in the PHP SDK, including autocomplete for workflow types, classes, and methods in both client API and workflow contexts, as well as better type hints for untyped stubs.
userImpact: Developers experience reduced productivity and increased errors due to lack of IDE autocomplete support when working with the PHP SDK.
proposedFix: Implement autocomplete support for workflow types/classes in client API, activity types in untyped stubs, signal/query/update methods, and force PromiseInterface result types in workflow contexts.
keyQuote: I would like better IDE support when working with the SDK.
